thread.section_title: Madison Hotel by MH - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great Location!
thread.title_full: Great Location! - Review of Madison Hotel by MH, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: kbluemke
title: Great Location!
text:
The location is amazing! It's in the St. Germain area close to many restaurants and shops. Just steps from Metro line 4 and many of the bus routes. And despite being located on Blvd. St. Germain, our room was very quiet due to the triple paned windows. The staff was very helpful and offered great suggestions. They even found a local cocktail bar for us that was a short walk from the hotel.
Room Tip: Book a larger room. See more room tips
